item.title: Ricky Martin,Christina Aguilera - Nobody Wants To Be Lonely
item.description:
There you are
in a darkened room
And you’re all alone
looking out the window
Your heart is cold
and lost the
Will to love
like a broken arrow
Here I stand
in the shadows
Come to me come to me
can’t you see
That nobody
wants to be lonely
Nobody wants to cry
my body’s
Longing to hold you
so bad it hurts
Inside time is
precious
And it’s slipping away
and I’ve been waitin’
For you
all of my life
Nobody wants to
be lonely so why
Why don’t you
let me love you
Oh why
can you hear my voice
Do you hear my song
it’s a serenade
So your heart
can find me
Oh- and suddenly
you’re flying
Down the stairs-
into my arms baby oh-
Before
I start going crazy
Run to me run to me
‘cause I’m dyin’
Nobody wants to
be lonely
Nobody wants to cry
my body’s
Longing to hold you
so bad it hurts
Inside time
is precious
And it’s slipping away
and I’ve been
Waitin’ for you
all of my life
Nobody wants to be
lonely so why-

let me love you
I wanna feel
you need me
Just like the air
you’re breathing’
I need you here
in my life
Don’t walk away-
don’t walk away
Walk away no no-
nobody wants to
Be lonely baby
nobody wants to cry
Nobody wants

Nobody wants to cry
my body’s
Longing to hold you
